Class PcHalfCards

java.lang.Object
  PcHalfCards

public class PcHalfCards
extends Object

Creates the hand for the computer player by taking the second half of the shuffled total of cards.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Antonios Skandalis, Nuria Cano Girones
